thread.title: Germany 1 - England 0: Lukas Podolski demonstrates the art of ruthlessness in final match
thread.title_full: Germany 1 - England 0: Lukas Podolski demonstrates the art of ruthlessness in final match

title: Germany 1 - England 0: Lukas Podolski demonstrates the art of ruthlessness in final match

organizations.name: premier league championship scottish premiership germany

text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Germany 1 - England 0: Lukas Podolski demonstrates the art of ruthlessness in final match LUKAS PODOLSKI signed off from German duty in style with a 25-yard thunder bolt to sink a bold England side. PUBLISHED: 21:38, Wed, Mar 22, 2017 | UPDATED: 21:43, Wed, Mar 22, 2017 REUTERS Lukas Podolski hit a wonder strike to seal a 1-0 win over England 
England had had the better of the game with Dele Alli and Adam Lallana going close in the first half, before Podolski’s moment of magic. 
Much of the build up had surrounded Podolski who was playing his final international match. 
And he smashed in his 49th goal on his 131st cap. REUTERS Lukas Podolski's strike killed England's hopes after a strong start to the game 
England trialled a back three and it looked neat with Gary Cahill leading the way. 
Although it was the Chelsea man who stood off Podolski for the goal. 
Michael Keane made his debut and did ok apart from one moment when Leroy Sane threatened to run riot. REUTERS Gareth Southgate's side were decent by ended up losing to Podolski's wonder strike 
Alli and Lallana were England’s best players and linked well with Jamie Vardy, playing through the middle. 
But it was an inexperienced side and they were unable to show the ruthless edge needed at international level to make their dominance count. 
Podolski, in the end, with the stroke of his left foot, gave them a demonstration of how to do it. Related articles
